name: pinggy
description: Create secure, shareable tunnels to your localhost and manage them from the command line.

scripts.dev: npm link @pinggy/pinggy && npm run build && npm link
scripts.pack:linux-x64: npm run pre-pkg && pkg . --targets node20-linux-x64 --output out/pinggy-linux-x64 && npm run post-pkg
scripts.pack:linux-arm64: npm run pre-pkg && pkg . --targets node20-linux-arm64 --output out/pinggy-linux-arm64 && npm run post-pkg
scripts.pack:win-x64: npm run pre-pkg && pkg . --targets node20-win-x64 --output out/pinggy-win-x64.exe && npm run post-pkg
scripts.pack:macos-x64: npm run pre-pkg && pkg . --targets node20-macos-x64 --output out/pinggy-macos-x64 && npm run post-pkg
scripts.pack:macos-arm64: npm run pre-pkg && pkg . --targets node20-macos-arm64 --output out/pinggy-macos-arm64 && npm run post-pkg
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack:linux-x64 && npm run pack:linux-arm64 && npm run pack:win-x64 && npm run pack:macos-x64 && npm run pack:macos-arm64
